billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Prohibits mercantile establishments from allowing customers to wear certain articles of apparel before purchase thereof
summary: Prohibits mercantile establishments from allowing customers to wear undergarments before purchase thereof; prescribes a civil penalty of not more than one hundred dollars and for subsequent violations, not more than five hundred dollars.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the wearing of certain apparel by consumers prior to the purchase thereof
